name: WP Simple Twitter Feed
author: 9Pixels - Web Development Agency

sections.description:
WP Simple Twitter Feed it’s a plugin that allows users to create easy twitter feeds. The tweets are received through Twitter API, this allows us not to slow down the front-end.

The plugin it’s user and developer friendly, the user can choose from two main styles and the developers can use their own HTML code.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Plugin JS was loaded site-wide, now is loaded only on plugin page, a couple of bugs fixed with this version, CMB2 close issue fixed.
  • tags update

1.0.2

  • PHP4 Widget __constructor fix.

1.0.1

  • small bugs fixed

1.0.0

  • First release

short_description: Simple Twitter Feed WordPress Plugin, friendly with developers!
